sys_script_include.name: EdaSetProperty

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_4cbcb79d1bd63d50b76a0d0fdc4bcb12
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_rhtpp_eda.EdaSetProperty</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EdaSetProperty</name><script><![CDATA[var EdaSetProperty = Class.create();
EdaSetProperty.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	setProperty: function(name, value){
		var request = new GlideRecord("x_rhtpp_eda_settings");
		request.initialize();
		request.property_name = name;
		request.property_value = value;
		request.insert();
	},
	
	delay: function(ms) {
		var endTime = new GlideDuration().getNumericValue() + ms;
		while ( new GlideDuration().getNumericValue() < endTime) {
			// do nothing
		}
	},
	
	setProperties: function(pairs) {
		gs.setProperty("x_rhtpp_eda.check_incident_created", true);
	},
	
	setProperties2: function(pairs) {
		for(var i = 0; i < pairs.length; i++) {
			this.setProperty(pairs[i][0], pairs[i][1]);
		}
		for (var t = 0; t < 100; t++) {
			var synced = true;
			this.delay(100);
			for(i = 0; i < pairs.length; i++) {
				if(gs.getProperty(pairs[i][0]) != pairs[i][1]) {
					synced = false;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(synced) {
				break;
			}
		}
	},

    type: 'EdaSetProperty'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bill_wei</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-03 20:16:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>4cbcb79d1bd63d50b76a0d0fdc4bcb12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EdaSetProperty</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Event-Driven Ansible Notification Service" source="x_rhtpp_eda">cb4182e69767611049b0b9dfe153af15</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Event-Driven Ansible Notification Service">cb4182e69767611049b0b9dfe153af15</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4cbcb79d1bd63d50b76a0d0fdc4bcb12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-25 16:49:25</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
